00019     def loadPlottable(self):

00022         import numpy as nx
00023 
00024         # Construct a simple graph--typically this data will be loaded
00025         x = nx.linspace(0,1.,10000)
00026         y = nx.sin(2*nx.pi*x*2.8)
00027         dy = nx.sqrt(100*nx.abs(y))/100
00028         #put data in container--this will typically be done by gui widget
00029         data1 = Data1D(x,y,dy=dy)
00030         data1.xaxis('distance', 'm')
00031         data1.yaxis('time', 's')
00032         #data2 = Theory1D(x,y,dy=dy)
00033         #put the data in the graph container
00034         self.graphgraph.title('Walking Results')
